Script.name: tecReportIssuesHelp(tecBrief, tecWindow)
Script.script:
--help user create an issue request --tecBrief is if screen reporting should be brief --tecWindow is the string name of the window to send the command help to function tecReportIssuesHelp(tecBrief, tecWindow)
--if a window was forgotten default to main tecWindow = tecWindow or "main" tecBrief = tecBrief or false
cechoLink(tecWindow, "<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">debug report issue", [[tecReportIssues()]], "Report client issues", true) if not tecBrief then --if we do not want to be brief echo(tecWindow, ", Report client issues to developers.
") else echo(tecWindow, "
") end --end if not tecBrief
end --function tecReportIssues
function tecReportDebugHelp() echo("
---Debug collection helper---
") echo("Please do not follow these steps unless you have opened an issue report and " .."were asked to collect debug data from a developer.
" .."The debug modes available are: ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">debug on<reset>, ", [[setTECDebugMode(true)]], "Enable basic debug", true) cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">debug display on<reset>, ", [[setTECDisplayDebugMode(true)]], "Enable display debugging", true) cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">debug map on<reset>, ", [[setTECMapDebugMode(true)]], "Enable map debugging", true) echo("and ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">debug timer on<reset>.
", [[setTECTimerDebugMode(true)]], "Enable timer debugging", true) echo("After enabling the debug mode or modes requested clear your main window with, ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">display clear
", [[UIManagerClearMainWindow() tecReportDebugHelp()]], "Remove text from main screen", true) echo("Now cause the issue reported to occur. After you have disable debug mode with ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">debug off.
", [[setTECDebugMode(false)]], "Disable debugging", true) echo("Please verify the debug window has text in it than click ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Save debug window.
", [[tecSaveWindowText("tecDebugWindow")]], "Save debug window text to file", true) echo("Please save the text in the main window to file by clicking: ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Save main window.
", [[tecSaveWindowText()]], "Save main window text to file", true) echo("Open your issue report, at the TEC gitHub ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Issue Page.
", [[openUrl("https://github.com/TheEternalCitizens/mudlet-integration/issues")]], "Goto issues page", true) echo("Open the folder that contains the debug window text by clicking ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Open Folder.
", [[tecOpenDirectory(tecDebugSaveDir)]], "Open debug save folder", true) cecho("Open main.txt and tecDebugWindow.txt and verify nothing is in it that you would " .."not want to be viewed by the public.
" .."<black:red>If for any reason you do not want to make text on your screen publically visable " .."please skip the next step highlighted in blue.<reset> " .."<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Drag the files tecDebugWindow.txt and main.txt into the comment area of your " .."gitHub issues report.<reset>
" .."To update your issue click the green button labeled -Comment-
" .."It may take days or weeks to receive a reply to your issue report.
") end --function tecReportDebugHelp()
function tecReportStandardIssue() echo("
---Create an issue request helper---
") echo("Go to the client's issue reporting gitHub page: ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Issue Page.
", [[openUrl("https://github.com/TheEternalCitizens/mudlet-integration/issues")]], "Goto issues page", true) echo("Please view our current open issues to see if your issue was already reported.
" .."If you have not you will need to log into gitHub.
" .."To create an issue report click the green -New Issue- button, on the right side of the page.
" .."A new page will load. In the -Title- section please provide a brief description of your issue\(s\).
" .."In the comment section labeled -Leave a comment-. Fully describe your issue\(s\).
" .."It is highly recommendable to clear you main display and recreate your issue " .."before continuing forward.
" .."If you would like to, clear your display with: ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">display clear
", [[UIManagerClearMainWindow() tecReportDebugHelp()]], "Remove text from main screen", true) echo("Save the text in the main window to file by clicking: ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Save main window.
", [[tecSaveWindowText()]], "Save main window text to file", true) echo("This file is called main.txt and can easily found by clicking: ") cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Open Folder.
", [[tecOpenDirectory(tecDebugSaveDir)]], "Open debug save folder", true) cecho("Open main.txt and verify nothing is in it that you would not want to be viewed " .."by the public!
" .."<black:red>If for any reason you do not want to make text on your screen publically visable " .."please skip the next step highlighted in blue.<reset> " .."<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">Now drag the file main.txt into the comment area of the gitHub issues report.<reset>
" .."At this time, please do not attach any other files to the issue report.
" .."To submit your issue click the green button labeled -Submit new issue-
" .."It may take days or weeks to receive a reply to your issue report.
") end --end function tecReportMajorIssue
function tecReportIssues()
cecho("<black:red>
Please follow the instructions below.
")
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">
---Start an issue request---
", [[tecReportStandardIssue()]], "Standard issue report tutorial", true)
cechoLink("<:"..tecSettings.helpHighlightColor..">
---A developer asked you to enable debug---", [[tecReportDebugHelp()]], "Debug collection tutorial", true)
echo("
") --leave this as the last line. cechlink does not autoscroll main display.
end --function tecReportIssues

Script.name: setTECDisplayDebugMode
Script.script:

if tecSettings.tecDisplayDebugMode then echo("Display debug mode on.\n") else echo("Display Debug Off.\n") end end --end setTECVideoDebugMode
